reviewText: Needs a DVD player that is compatible with international videos :(
If you're buying it in your in the US you're going to have to change your settings from US UK settings. Still love the DVD and I love Charlotte
Perhaps it is incompatible with a US DVD player, or the disc was damaged, but the DVD did not work.  Disappointed as I had heard good things.
Really great ,fast and tough work out.
I am extremely disappointed! I live in America and this dvd won't play on any of my DVD players. It says my region code is wrong. I was so excited to try this and now I can't even use it!
Incredible. I'd recommend it to anyone that wants a fun, interesting full body work out.

I was really disappointed with this book. I'm a huge fan of charlotte's. The lunch and dinner recipes seemed mostly good but I noticed everything had sweet potato in it and there were a lot of egg recipes. I didn't find the recipes original and the book certainly wasn't worth the $15 I paid. Money wasted. I could've gotten these recipes online for free. Sorry Charlotte.
It works great. Is actually great fun and easy enough for everyone to understand.
